mapper.select: SELECT loginID ,name ,tel ,mail FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_type = 'B'
SELECT Count(*) FROM tb_userinfo WHERE user_type = 'B'

SELECT lec_id, lec_name, DATE_FORMAT(c_st, '%Y.%m.%d') as c_st, DATE_FORMAT(c_end, '%Y.%m.%d') as c_end, truncate((pre_day/process_day*100),0)as day_result, max_pnum, tutor_name, ui.loginID FROM tb_lec_info INNER JOIN ( SELECT loginID FROM tb_user_info ) AS ui ON ui.loginID = tutor_id
WHERE tutor_id=#{tutor_id}

select lsi.std_id, ui.tel, ui.name, li.pre_day, ( ifnull(a1.cnt,0) + ifnull(a2.cnt,0) ) as cnt, truncate(100-(( ifnull(a1.cnt,0) + ifnull(a2.cnt,0) ) / li.pre_day*100),0) as res from tb_lecstd_info lsi left outer join ( select ta.std_id ,( count(*) div 3 ) as cnt from tb_atd ta where (atd_state = '2' or atd_state ='3') AND lec_id=#{lec_id} group by ta.std_id ) as a1 on a1.std_id = lsi.std_id left outer join ( select std_id ,count(*) as cnt from tb_atd where atd_state = '4' AND lec_id=#{lec_id} group by std_id ) as a2 on a2.std_id = lsi.std_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginId = lsi.std_Id left outer join ( select pre_day, lec_id, lec_name from tb_lec_info ) as li on li.lec_id = lsi.lec_id where lsi.lec_id = #{lec_id}

select distinct(atd.len_date)as d_len
from tb_atd atd left outer join tb_userinfo ui on ui.loginId = atd.std_Id where atd.lec_id = #{lec_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_atd( lec_id, std_id, len_date, atd_time, atd_state, note )values( #{lec_id}, #{std_id}, now(), now(), #{atd_state}, #{note} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(len_date, '%y/%m/%d') AS len_date FROM tb_atd WHERE lec_id = #{lec_id} GROUP BY len_date ORDER BY len_date
select * from tb_atd where len_date = #{len_date} and lec_id=#{lec_id}
